Example.Name: ADC_DualMode_Example
Example.Description:
This example provides a short description of how to use the ADC peripheral to convert a regular channel in Dual interleaved mode using the DMA to read the converted Data from the commun DR register. Detailed steps of ADC1 and ADC2 configuration are provided starting from GPIO configuration to the analog channel configuration without forgetting the ADC1 and ADC2 calibration procedure.
In this example the shared input ADC12 Channel7(PC1) is used for ADC1 and ADC2. ADC12 Channel7(PC1) is directly connected to the potentiometer(RV2) available on the STM32303C-EVAL evaluation board.
